title: Size Does Matter!!
itunes:title: Size Does Matter!!
description: We're lighting up 3 different sizes of the Oliva Connecticut Petite Corona, and despite what you say, size DOES matter... and we'll prove it today. The cheap flavored giant companies want to now get into the "Premium Market," John Hart from Drew Estate drops in for an expected visit, and Gentleman Chuck Morrison gets gentlemanly with the man who wrote the book on "How to Become a Gentleman," John Bridges.
